actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

actions.subcommittee: International Security, Proliferation and Federal Services
actions.text: Committee on Governmental Affairs referred to Subcommittee on International Security, Proliferation and Federal Services.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on International Security, Proliferation and Federal Services

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that a commemorative postage stamp should be issued by the United States Postal Service honoring the members of the Armed Forces who have been awarded the Purple Heart.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that: (1) a commemorative postage stamp should be issued by the Postal Service to honor the members of the armed forces who have been awarded the Purple Heart; and (2) the Citizens' Stamp Advisory Committee should recommend to the Postmaster General that such a stamp be issued within one year after the adoption of this resolution.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that a commemorative postage stamp should be issued by the United States Postal Service honoring the members of the Armed Forces who have been awarded the Purple Heart.
